mods.note: Two photographs of Oakland School - one showing the outside with children in front of the building. This caption reads "Oakland School house in one year later, showing .....tions After work of School Improvement Association. Return......Clyde Clarke, Jackson Bldg. Nashville......" The other shows the empty classroom inside the schoolhouse.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
